Serialized Form

  • Package gate.zemanta

    • Class gate.zemanta.ZemantaServicePR extends AbstractLanguageAnalyser implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -8443994795704361590L

      • Serialized Fields

        • apiKey

          String apiKey
          developer key. One has to obtain this from Zemanta by creating an account online

        • outputASName

          String outputASName
          Name of the annotation set where new annotations should be created.

        • inputASName

          String inputASName
          The PR requires Sentence annotations as input. This parameter tells PR where it can find the Sentence annotations

        • numberOfSentencesInBatch

          Integer numberOfSentencesInBatch
          Number of sentences to be sent to Zemanta to process in one batch Default is 10 sentences.

        • numberOfSentencesInContext

          Integer numberOfSentencesInContext
          This is the number of sentences that are used as sentences in context both on left and right side and not annotated when sent as part of a batch unless there's no more sentence to be considered as part of the context.

        • SERVICE_URL

          String SERVICE_URL
          Service URL

        • zemanta

          com.zemanta.api.Zemanta zemanta
          Zemanta service
